column4: I have a RAID1 array and tested the redundancy by removing one drive, it worked flawlessly!. Now I re-plugged it in and am trying to re-sync with the array but each time I reboot it continues to only load one mirror and says that the drive is degraded!.

I have a RAID1 array and tested the redundancy by removing one drive, it worked flawlessly!. Now I re-plugged it in and am trying to re-sync with the array but each time I reboot it continues to only load one mirror and says that the drive is degraded!.
